contexts.context: "I am Kena <mark>Warfel</mark> Tomasin, and I can prove that Akatosh,...
..., Nirn, and Oblivion are one," said <mark>Warfel</mark>, writing out the mathematical formula that showed it...
...mathematical formula, which proved correct, and Kena <mark>Warfel</mark> Tomasin vaporized on the spot.
